descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: 76ers center Nerlens Noel gets a steal then goes behind-the-back and delivers impressive jam against the Heat.
videos.headline: Noel's behind-the-back flush

videos.description: After rejecting 76ers C  Jahlil Okafor's layup attempt, Heat C Hassan Whiteside goes the other way to finish with a dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Whiteside rejects Okafor, rewards himself with dunk) 2015/11/21 ESHEET

videos.headline: Whiteside rejects Okafor, rewards himself with dunk
